sqlMap.select:
SELECT t_sys_user_unit.Unit_Id, t_sys_user_unit.User_Id ,( select Login_Name from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Login_Name ,( select login_Password from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) login_Password ,( select User_Name from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) User_Name ,( select Mobile_Phone from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Mobile_Phone ,( select Is_Valid from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Is_Valid ,( select DATE_FORMAT(Create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Create_date ,( select Creator_Id from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Creator_Id ,( select Remark from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Remark ,( select CASE WHEN t_sys_user.is_valid='Y' THEN '有效' ELSE '无效' END from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) isValidName ,( select tsu1.User_Name from t_sys_user tsu1,t_sys_user tsu2 where tsu2.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id and tsu1.User_Id=tsu2.Creator_Id) creatorIdName , (SELECT Unit_Name FROM t_sys_unit unit1 WHERE unit1.Unit_Id=t_sys_user_unit.Unit_Id ) unitName FROM t_sys_user_unit
order by $orderByClause$

SELECT t_sys_user_unit.Unit_Id, t_sys_user_unit.User_Id ,( select Login_Name from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Login_Name ,( select login_Password from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) login_Password ,( select User_Name from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) User_Name ,( select Mobile_Phone from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Mobile_Phone ,( select Is_Valid from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Is_Valid ,( select DATE_FORMAT(Create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Create_date ,( select Creator_Id from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Creator_Id ,( select Remark from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) Remark ,( select CASE WHEN t_sys_user.is_valid='Y' THEN '有效' ELSE '无效' END from t_sys_user where t_sys_user.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id) isValidName ,( select tsu1.User_Name from t_sys_user tsu1,t_sys_user tsu2 where tsu2.User_Id=t_sys_user_unit.User_Id and tsu1.User_Id=tsu2.Creator_Id) creatorIdName , (SELECT Unit_Name FROM t_sys_unit unit1 WHERE unit1.Unit_Id=t_sys_user_unit.Unit_Id ) unitName FROM t_sys_user_unit
sqlMap.delete: delete from t_sys_user_unit where Unit_Id = #unitId:VARCHAR# and User_Id = #userId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_sys_user_unit (Unit_Id, User_Id, Remark) values (#unitId:VARCHAR#, #userId:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#)

Remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
where Unit_Id = #unitId:VARCHAR# and User_Id = #userId:VARCHAR#
